{{Wireless embedded system |brand=EnGenius |model=ESR300 |revision=H |upc=230494858492 |ean= |asin=B006HIZMSY |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/12/2011 |manuf_country= |manuf=Senao |manuf_model=SR300 |manuf_rev=H |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=U2M-SR300H |ic_id=3616C-SR300H |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196C |cpu1_cspeed=390 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192CE |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=high power |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''High Power 300Mbps Wireless N Router'''
[http://www.engeniustech.com.sg/node/659 Product page] on ''EnGenius'' (Singapore)
"ESR150H-0.30 LFP" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
==Additional external links== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.pcmag.com/article2/0,2817,2398239,00.asp Reviewed on '''PCMag.com'''] :High Power - 200mW *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces-2012/31666-ces-2012-engenius-launches-long-range-n-router-line ''CES 2012: EnGenius Launches Long-Range N Router Line'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''']
